name: Remote Raiders
description:
Fight your friends, explore tombs and get involved with other daring antics in this multiplayer game!

Not enough controllers? That's okay! This game uses your Android or iOS smartphone as the controller! Just be sure to download the app on the Google Play or iOS app stores!

When each round starts, every player is given their own secret objectives, displayed on your mobile device! Complete the objectives to earn points and outshine your friends!

Features:

Easily connect via wifi to play with up to 10 friends!

Smack people with crazy items, unleash snakes, explode dynamite, or put up powerful barricades!

Dodge dangerous traps and run from boulders in a 1920s pulp inspired world
